properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 4:57AM AKST until February 19 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Travel will be very
difficult. Additional snow accumulations of 1 inch is expected.
Visibility will be one quarter mile or less at times.

* WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula.

* WHEN...Until noon today.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 35 mph will cause low
visibility in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is
likely. Conditions will improve this afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY
